Messaoud Bellemou bụ onye egwu Algeria na otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị emetụta egwu raï nke oge a
Ụfọdụ ndị na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị nna nke Modern Raï Music.
Messaoud malitere ọrụ ya na-afụ opi mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, a maara ya maka ịgbakwunye ngwá egwu mba ọzọ dị ka saxophone, violin, na accordion na ụdị ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'afọ ndị 1970 ya na ndị na-agụ egwú raï dị iche iche nke ọgbọ ya dị ka Boutaïaba Sghir, Boussouar El Maghnaoui, Bouteldja Belkacem.

N'afọ 1980, a na-eji okwu pop-raï akọwa ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke chebs na chebats (site na Arabic maka "onye na-eto eto") na-ewebata ngwá egwu ọhụrụ, ya na Belkacem Bouteldja wepụtara otu n'ime ndekọ mbụ nke ụdị ọhụrụ ahụ.
